text: I thought this was a good company but apparently it’s not!  You guys closed my bank account and that it’s not letting me open up an roar account this is so ridiculous
title: Annoyed!!

reply.message: We apologize to hear about your experience with MoneyLion. We would like to help resolve your concerns but are unable to locate your account to reach out to you. Please use the form linked below to fill out and we will contact you directly. https://moneylioncomplaints.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

text:
So when I initially used money lion, it was a life saver. I didn't like the fact that I had to make several withdrawals as they only do increments of $50. I put a hefty tip on the first withdrawal and did not on the second. I paid both of those off as requested and required no problem. When I came back about a month later, I immediately got a message asking if I was happy with the service because I don't tip???? They actually sent me an email asking about a $3.00 tip. They even took it off of the newly borrowed $50. They had sent another email insinuating that it was a past debt that would keep me from borrowing. They keep trying to get me to get their card but it's a virtual card???? If you need $50 or less for a quick second but anything more they will force tips and take them. I'm waiting on my pay back so I can close my account all together. Yes I have proof of everything I am writing. Enjoy!

10/23 In response to Money Lion, I normally tip every single time but I did 2 back to back withdrawls and tipped heafty on the first withdrawl. Everything was completely paid back. When I went to use your system again, Your company emailed me about not tipping the previous time and was specific in asking about $3.00 10/05. When my account was funding with the $50.00 requested from Money lion on the 6th. Yall took the $3.00. It was for a fee or previous balance owed. So you website says tip what you like and even has the option not to tip HOWEVER yall will take it anyway once you fund the new instacash out. I have proof of everything I am saying it you would like to see it. Please feel free to email me and get the information since you feel the need to response and defend yourself.Thankyou
title: Money Lion takes Tips without permission

reply.message: Tipping is optional, and whether you choose to tip doesn’t affect your eligibility in any way. Pay what you think is fair, or don't pay at all, it's up to you. Just be sure to read the screens and make your selections carefully, and you can use Instacash without tips or fees if you choose. That said, if you choose to leave a tip — thank you! It helps us cover the costs of providing 0% APR cash advance to many, many folks like you!

text:
I like the quick availability 
There's only two things I dont really like about the app....I can never get the whole amount at once I always have to request an advance twice to get the full amount....which means double fees 😭
And everytime I get an advance i have to put in my debit card information 👎
title: I like the quick availability

reply.message: Hi there, Taylor. Thank you so much for this awesome 5-star review! We're happy to know that our 0% APR InstaCash is able to provide assistance to you! Additionally, we designed Instacash to help you access smaller amounts of cash in a pinch, such as for an unexpected late fee or a can't-miss date night and we designed it to be easy to pay back! It isn't meant to be a way to fund your larger expenses. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash in maximum increments of $50. We appreciate your feedback regarding InstaCash so that we can continue to improve our products and services. It’s members like you that help make MoneyLion ROAR! Given you’ve expressed a positive experience with MoneyLion, would you be open to also sharing this review on other review sites, including Google Play, Apple Store, BBB, and Wallethub? Thanks again for being the best part of MoneyLion!

text: As with most offers that seem too sweet to be healthy, I was initially skeptical about Money Lion. But this time I was wrong. It is one of the most straightforward and versatile financial tools I ever used. It has made life so much easier that I feel like I'm floating through bills, gas purchases, and online shopping. Other Apps should take note.

text: Came through in a pinch. Not a fan of the 50$ increments if you do multiple same-day withdraws(depends on your limit) you will pay for each one and the back pay turn around takes 3-4 days to post before you can withdraw again. other than that it helped when needed.
title: Came through in a pinch

reply.message: Hi Pa, We created Instacash to help you access extra money to cover everyday essentials and unexpected expenses, and we designed it to be easy to pay back. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash in increments of $50 or less. Of course, if you’ve unlocked an Instacash limit higher than $50, it will all still be available to you if you need it. You’ll just have to take it out in advances of $50 at a time. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

text:
I don’t write reviews to often, that’s bc it’s rare to find someone, something or somewhere that is. MoneyLion deserves six in my book. They’ve stuck with me, treated me and trust me. I trust them to. I’ve been building myself back up and all thanks to MoneyLion! This pandemic has been hard for everyone, and I’m more than thankful to MoneyLion. Literally without them I would have been in some tough spots of these weeks. I wish I had the vocabulary to properly thank them in the way that I feel. Right now THANK YOU in caps is how I’m feeling. Great app, great support team. I’ll keep them as long as they’re around
Matthew Richitelli
